title: The Far Horizon - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/27/21
itunes:title: The Far Horizon - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/27/21
description:
George Noory and author Michael Prescott explore his research into life after death, near death experiences and past life memories, and how that proves there is another dimension the soul enters into after the body dies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
